revised_title: Optical Determinations of Melting Points and Transition Points at High Pressures
tldr: The authors describe a new method for determining melting points and transition points of substances at high pressures using optical and volumetric techniques. They discuss the historical context of previous research in this area and present their findings on carbon tetrabromide and α- and β-bromopropionic acids.
scientific_subdiscipline: Condensed Matter Physics & Solid State Physics
